title: From darkness to glory: Tech's journey to becoming 'forever champions' - VT hokiesports.com
content: From darkness to glory: Tech's journey to becoming 'forever champions'  VT hokiesports.com
description: What transpired over the course of the 2021-22 Virginia Tech men's basketball season was nothing short of remarkable. It's stuff people watch ESPN documentaries on. Consider this, a team once in the ACC cellar as of January 26, mounted an improbable run for the ages that culminated with maroon and orange confetti falling amidst a bunch of jubilant Hokies who capped off one of the most historic finishes to a season in ACC history.
